title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Emotional Support Design Strategies for Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational math concepts and experience applying them to tasks
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners accurately identify at least 80% of the eight emotional design principles (positivity, playfulness, human elements, etc.) provided in the online math learning environment.
Learners enhance learning satisfaction by at least 70% by utilizing emotional support features during mobile-interface-based math problem-solving.
Learners maintain weekly learning participation rates of 85% or higher using communication tools that foster emotional bonds with peer learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
